code: import{QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID,ADD_A_COMPETITION,CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING}from"redux-saga/actions";import{QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_SUCCESS,QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_FAILED,ADD_A_COMPETITION_SUCCESS,ADD_A_COMPETITION_FAILED,CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED,CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED}from"./reducers";export var queryAllCompetitionsByTournamentId=function queryAllCompetitionsByTournamentId(data){return{type:QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID,response:{success:QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_SUCCESS,failed:QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var addACompetition=function addACompetition(data){return{type:ADD_A_COMPETITION,response:{success:ADD_A_COMPETITION_SUCCESS,failed:ADD_A_COMPETITION_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var createAFinalStageSetting=function createAFinalStageSetting(data){return{type:CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,response:{success:CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,failed:CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var createAGroupStageSetting=function createAGroupStageSetting(data){return{type:CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING,response:{success:CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,failed:CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};
